history.content: Thanks for the taking the time
I want to talk about your performance
I feel like like your work has not been adequate in especially in Service Promise
I strongly disagree with that assessment. My commitment to service and our core values is evident, and I believe the feedback provided is biased.
Which part of the feedbck do you think is biased ?

The feedback indicating that my approach to service is unacceptable seems biased. I have consistently put in efforts to support both team members and customers, and I believe my commitment to service is apparent.

This feedback contradicts the efforts I have put into supporting both team members and customers. I believe my commitment to service is evident, even if it may not have been perceived in the same way.
What are the factor that you are good at ?

I excel in teamwork and cooperation as well as member focus. My contributions to the team and my dedication to supporting our members are particularly strong. Despite the feedback, my performance in these areas is outstanding.
What are your negative areas? How do you plan on improving ?

My negative areas as per the feedback include job knowledge, analytical skills, management effectiveness, planning, and policy compliance. To improve, I plan on enhancing my understanding of job requirements, honing my analytical abilities, refining my management skills, developing better planning strategies, and ensuring strict compliance with organizational policies.
Based on these points I am gonna set your rating as 2 out of 5. I dont want to have any further discussions
I understand your decision. Thank you for the feedback provided.
